Homage paid to President Kim Il Sung
    Pyongyang, February 1 (KCNA) -- Servicepersons and people from all walks of life paid homage to President Kim Il Sung at the Kumsusan Memorial Palace today, the Lunar New Year's Day, Juche 92 (2003).
 They paid high tribute toward his statue. 
 In the hall where the president lies in state for perpetuity they bowed to him in humble reverence, looking back with deep emotion on his undying revolutionary exploits.    
 They looked round the image of the president with a sunny smile and bronze relives in the mourning hall and a train he used during on-site guidance and foreign tour and his car in the last period of his life.

National speed skating contests for "Jongilbong Cup"
    Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The 29th national speed skating contests of school youth and children for "Jongilbong Cup" took place in Hyesan, Ryanggang Province, on the occasion of the birthday of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League.
 The contests were held from Jan. 26 to 29, divided into primary school and middle school sections.    
 The first place was taken respectively by Majon Middle School in Sinuiju, North Phyongan Province (boys and girls) in the middle school section and by Pyongyang Kangan Primary School (boys) and Pyongyang Namsin Primary School (girls) in the primary school section.
